VAC can't verify the game files so now I can't play. This is what I get for all my time and money? A VAC error that makes me unable to even play casual with my friends? Thanks Valve you've taken almost 2 months of my life and made it amount to nothing. Every good memory covered with salt.

I come back to play cs after a couple of years from pubg because csgo is ment to be a "plolished game". Play it for a couple of weeks to find myself not being able to join games due to some bug with the VAC which is a known issue and has been happening since the game came out.... dont waste your time getting into the game and start enjoying yourself cause this will happen and ruin your day
